entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to a few wet flurries and rain showers overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
